title: wiki: projects list needs curation
body:
by **ContestsEOPO**: 
There are wrong links in the project dashboard:

1. optarg - An easy to use GNU-style... [http://code.google.com/p/optarg/]
  Moved to - https://github.com/jteeuwen/go-pkg-optarg

2. curses.go - GO binding for NCurses [https://github.com/thiagoncc/curses.go]
  Replaced by goncurses ( already in list).

3. tcattr-go - Thin wrapper around termios... [https://github.com/Roorback/tcattr-go]
  Deleted

4. inline - Library for line editing lib [https://github.com/kless/inline]
  Moved to https://github.com/kless/Go-Inline

5. pbkdf2.go - PBKDF2 password hashing [https://bitbucket.org/taruti/pbkdf2.go]
  Should be - https://bitbucket.org/taruti/pbkdf2

6. gorbt - A simple red black tree [http://code.google.com/p/gorbt/]
  Deleted
  
7. seelog - powerful and easy-to-learn logging...[https://github.com/cihub/seelogfast]
  Should be - https://github.com/cihub/seelog

8. Tideland Redis Database Client...[http://code.google.com/p/tideland-rdc/]
  Deleted

9. gofluid - FluidDB client library for Go [http://code.google.com/p/gofluid/]
  Deleted

10. gofluiddb - A lightweight wrapper around...[https://github.com/micrypt/GoFluidDB]
  Deleted

11. deifdef - Removes #ifdef/#endif blocks...[http://code.google.com/p/deifdef/]
  Deleted

12. pkgdoc - Pkgdoc generates HTML documentation... [https://github.com/garyburd/pkgdoc]
  Deleted

...

Should be more.
